item.title: Video Editor for A Barber Shop Promo - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a skilled video editor to edit a series of videos filmed in ProRes Log on an Apple 15 Pro Max. The project is a commercial for a barber shop, and we need the final edits to be polished, professional, and engaging.

Requirements:
- Experience in editing videos filmed in ProRes Log.
- Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
- Ability to deliver high-quality 4K video in 16:9 aspect ratio.
- Ability to create an engaging 9:16 promo video (under a minute).

Deliverables:
1. A 16:9 4K short commercial.
2. A 9:16 promotional video (under a minute).

Additional Information:
- The raw footage will be provided.
- Creativity and attention to detail are essential.
- Quick turnaround time is preferred.

If you have the skills and experience to bring our vision to life, please apply with your portfolio and a brief description of your editing process.

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 17, 2024 21:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Crowdfunding Video Creation - Upwork
item.description:
About Us:
BCP is dedicated to producing high-quality, all-natural health supplements for dogs. Our latest product is poised to make a significant impact on the well-being of our furry friends. We are gearing up for a crowdfunding campaign to bring this product to market and need a talented video creator to help tell our story.

Job Description:
We are seeking a creative and experienced Crowdfunding Video Creator to develop a compelling video for our upcoming crowdfunding campaign. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio of previous crowdfunding videos and a passion for storytelling. Responsibilities include conceptualizing, scripting, and producing a high-quality video that captures the essence of our product, sourcing and incorporating relevant visuals and animations, ensuring the final product aligns with our brand's voice while effectively communicates our mission. Proven experience in creating successful crowdfunding videos, strong storytelling skills, and proficiency in video editing software are required. Please submit a link to your portfolio showcasing previous projects and an rough estimate.


Posted On: June 17, 2024 21:04 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, Self-Help, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: MP4, Self-Help, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Orlando_video recap and testimonials for a trade show booth_July 9-10 - Upwork
item.description:
We are TaxDome, a practice management software for accounting and bookkeeping firms. From July 9-10, we will be at a trade show in Orlando and would like to create video content: - 1 recap video featuring the team and clients at our booth - 5 short testimonials per day with clients at the booth (3-5 min each, static shots) The price in the offer includes two days at the event (4-5 hours) plus editing. Let's discuss your availability. After approval, I will send you the brief with a detailed project description.

Budget: $1,000

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and creative Freelance Video Editor to join our team. You will be responsible for editing engaging and high-quality videos for platforms like Instagram and YouTube. Your primary tasks will include adding B-Roll, integrating animated text, and ensuring the content is aligned with our brand’s aesthetic and message.

Key Responsibilities:
Video Editing: Edit videos for Instagram and YouTube, including trimming, splicing, and adding transitions.
B-Roll Integration: Select and add relevant B-Roll footage to enhance the storytelling.
Text Animation: Create and integrate animated text and graphics to highlight key points and information.
Audio Enhancement: Adjust audio levels, sync soundtracks, and ensure clear and engaging audio quality.
Color Correction: Perform basic color correction to enhance the visual appeal of the videos.
Content Adaptation: Tailor videos for specific platforms, ensuring they meet the technical requirements and engage the target audience.
Review and Revise: Collaborate with the content team to incorporate feedback and make necessary revisions.
File Management: Organize and manage video files and project assets efficiently.
Required Qualifications:
Experience: Proven experience as a video editor, particularly for social media platforms like Instagram and YouTube.
Software Proficiency: Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve.
B-Roll Skills: Strong ability to source, select, and integrate B-Roll footage.
Animation Skills: Experience in creating and integrating basic animated text and graphics.
Creativity: Strong sense of visual storytelling and the ability to create engaging and aesthetically pleasing content.
Attention to Detail: Keen eye for detail to ensure high-quality output.
Communication: Strong communication skills for effective collaboration with the content team.
Time Management: Ability to meet tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Preferred Qualifications:
Social Media Savvy: Familiarity with trends and best practices for video content on Instagram and YouTube.
Graphic Design Skills: Basic graphic design skills to create simple visuals if needed.
Portfolio: A portfolio showcasing previous video editing work, especially for social media platforms.
How to Apply:
If you are a creative video editor looking to make an impact with engaging social media content, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your resume and a portfolio of your recent work to [email address].



Posted On: June 17, 2024 21:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:2D Animation, Video Editing & Production, Photo Editing
Skills: 2D Animation, Video Editing & Production, Photo Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
Small video ad agency looking for editors with professional experience to edit business related videos for our clients.

Looking for someone who edits on FCPX ideally.

item.title: Construction Youtube Channel - Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Leading YouTube channel focused on showcasing the world of industrial machines, heavy equipment, and massive machinery. We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Video Editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for construction and industrial machinery and a knack for creating engaging and informative video content.

Responsibilities:

Edit raw video footage into high-quality, engaging videos for our YouTube channel.
Collaborate with the content team to understand video requirements and develop compelling stories.
Incorporate graphics, animations, and special effects to enhance video content.
Ensure videos are edited to a high standard, following our brand guidelines and maintaining a consistent style.
Optimize video content for YouTube, including SEO-friendly titles, descriptions, and tags.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and incorporate new techniques and technologies to improve video quality.
Manage video editing projects from start to finish, ensuring deadlines are met.
Continuously improve editing skills and stay informed about the latest video editing software and tools.

item.title: Audio Editor - Christian Content (Long term job) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced, skilled and dedicated YouTube Christian devotional audio editor to join our team.

Job details: Produce High Quality Audio for Christian YouTube channel

Niche: Christian sermon and prayer
Number of audio: Around 30-60 per month (1-2 audio daily)
Number of words per audio: Varies between 1500 to 3400 (+/- 200)
Turnaround Time: within 24 hrs per audio.
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)

Hello There! Thank you for considering our job post. If you are an experienced and talented individual, native English Speaker, have a heart for ministry through media, we would love to hear from you.

We run multiple YouTube channels and we expanding our team. We are seeking an experienced, talented and passionate audio editor to create high quality audio for our YouTube channel.

Our channel focuses on delivering impactful devotional messages and prayers with biblical teachings that resonate with everyday Christian life.

As the audio editor, you will be responsible for creating and editing the christian scripts for our YouTube videos.

You will need to generate the voice-overs from provided scripts.

This role requires a really quick turnaround. Please note this role is paid monthly on the last Friday of each month (based on the number of high quality audio files generated).

Responsibilities:
- Utilize PlayHt to generate and edit personalized AI voice-overs for various projects.

- Ensure smooth and consistent natural speaking tone of voice-overs.

- Detect and correct theological inconsistencies and sensitivities.

- Ensure the audio is dynamic and is not monotonous.

- Use necessary online research tools to ensure biblical accuracy.

- Use necessary online research tools to ensure biblical pronunciation accuracy.

- Apply the best tones and emotions according to the scripts.

- Edit and enhance raw audio files to meet high quality standards.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as an Audio Editor, with a portfolio showcasing your work in AI voice-overs, specifically using PlayHT, Descript or similar.

- Strong knowledge of current audio editing techniques and best practices.

-Experience in content creation for personal development, motivation or Christian niches.

- Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment

- Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

- Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with a remote team.

- Excellent time management skills and ability to meet deadlines.

- Excellent command of the English language. Proficiency in speaking and writing in the English language.

- Ability to thoroughly revise what you have generated before submitting completed audio files.

- Expect to do and submit at least 1-2 completed audio files daily.

- Expect to do necessary revisions for the audio as requested.

- Note: Being a Christian will make this job easier.

Order quantities: 30-60 audio files each month.
Budget: $1 per minute of audio (rounded of to the nearest minute)

To Apply:
If you are excited about this opportunity, please submit the following:
- A cover letter expressing your interest and highlighting relevant experience.
- Samples of previous AI voice-over work (PlayHT or similar).
- Any additional information you believe showcases your suitability for the role.

Please bid your price per minute. (Maximum budget $1 per minute of audio)

Additional details for further efficiency will be provided if you are selected for this job.

Start your bid/proposal with the words “Creative Christian", so we know you have read the post and understand what is required.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

If we find that you align with our needs, we will reach out to you to discuss the next steps in the application process.


Posted On: June 17, 2024 20:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Footage-Based Video, AI-Generated Video, 360-Degree Video Editing, Audio Editing, CapCut, Descript, Video Editing, English, Graphic Design
Skills: Footage-Based Video, AI-Generated Video, 360-Degree Video Editing, Audio Editing, CapCut, Descript, Video Editing, English, Graphic Design
Country: Jamaica
click to apply

item.title: One Minute Hype Video for Software Company - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor / creator to create a one minute hype video showcasing our enterprise software. We want this video to look and feel like Notion / Amplitude hype videos but a bit more exciting and upbeat

(link removed)
(link removed)

Importantly, as shown in the examples, it show various parts of our product within our actual Ul - not a simplified version. We will assist with recording product footage. Attaching a screenshot for rough look at our Ul / color schemes

The video should include text overlays, fun music, and quick snappy transitions to engage and excite our audience. As the video will be used for promotional purposes, it should effectively highlight the key features and benefits of our product. Needs to be modern and be consumer appealing, while also show professionalism / enterprise nature of our platform

Required Skills:
- Video editing
- Motion graphics
- Proficient in video editing software
- Ability to work with music and sound effects

Size: Small
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise: Intermediate

Only Apply if you can make videos like this, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SRowtjk8hXE&pp=ygUpYWRkYW1zIGZhbWlseSB0aGVuIGFuZCBub3cgIG5vc3RhbGdpYSB0diA%3D)  You will also be asked to provide.a 2 min sample of a given topic to make sure we are hiring the right person.



Budget: $40

item.title: Highly Creative Video Ads Creator for Ecommerce FB & TikTok - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a highly skilled video editor that knows how to make HIGH converting ads for Facebook and Tiktok. Must understand the psychology of buyers and consumers to create the best ads for our brands. You'll be creating ads for 3-5 brands every week for all types of creatives including TOF, MOF &  BOF.  

Must be able to have a fast turnaround time and work with a team. If the above applies to you and you meet the requirements below, please apply and we'll be looking forward to working with you!! Lots of work for talented skilled editors

Requirements:
- Know how to do market research & create different angles of ads
- MUST have experience creating ads that actually worked before
- Has proven formulas and style of ads that work on FB and TikTok
- Know how to create ads from a buyer/consumer perspective
- Know how to create the best ads for FB and TikTok
- Should have examples of the best ads that worked for you and why.
- Can work with a team and have a 24-48 hour turnaround time
- Created ads that produced high ROAS
- Have experience in ad creation for multiple product niches
- Very proactive on creating new ads. We want someone who will work with us instead of for us.
- Be able to take in ads that are currently working for us and make similar ads based on whats working
- NEED to be creative most importantly. Take the notes we send you but have the confidence and creativity to make the creative yourself.

DO NOT APPLY IF YOU ARE A LIFESTYLE EDITOR OR SOMEONE WHO HAS EDITED VIDEOS BUT NEVER FB OR TIKTOK ADS THAT HAVE BEEN PROVEN TO WORK AND SEE HIGH ROAS.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 17, 2024 20:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Audio Editing, Dialogue Editing, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Testimonial Video, Audio Editing, Dialogue Editing, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Adobe Premiere Pro

item.title: AI Video Editor - Christian Content (Long Term Job) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced, skilled and dedicated  YouTube Christian devotional video editor to join our team.

Job details:
- Produce High Quality Video for Christian YouTube channel

Niche: Christian sermon and prayer
Number of video: Around 30-60 per month (1-2 videos daily)
Length of Videos: Varies between 15 to 30 minutes (+/- 2)
Turnaround Time: Within 24 hrs per video.
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)

Hello There! Thank you for considering our job post. If you are an experienced and talented individual, native English Speaker, have a heart for ministry through media, we would love to hear from you.

We run multiple YouTube channels and we are expanding our team. We are seeking an experienced, talented and passionate video editor to create high quality video/audio/visuals for our YouTube channel.

Our channel focuses on delivering impactful devotional messages and prayers with biblical teachings that resonate with everyday Christian life.

As the video editor, you will be responsible for creating and editing the christian video subtitles with appropriate non copyrighted stock video footage, and non-copyrighted background music for our YouTube videos.

You will need to generate the videos from provided mp3 or .wav audio file.

This role requires a really quick turnaround. Please note this job is paid monthly on the last Friday of each month (based on the number of high quality video files generated)

Responsibilities:
- Utilize Veed.io and Descript or video editing or caption software to generate and edit videos for various projects.

- Utilize AI-based video editing tools to edit and enhance video content.

- Ensure smooth and consistent clean audio and video scene transitions.

-Ensure all videos contain non-copyrighted stock clips, subtitles, non-copyrighted background music and optimized for Youtube’s specifications and best practices and according to instructions given.

- Stay updated with the latest video editing trends to keep our content fresh and innovative.

- Apply the best quality stock footage to video project.

- Edit, clean and enhance raw mp3 audio files to produce high quality video/audio.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a Video Editor, with a portfolio showcasing your work with video editors, specifically using veed.io, capcut and descript or similar video editor.

- Strong knowledge of current video editing techniques and best practices.

-Experience in content creation for personal development, motivation or Christian niches.
Familiarity with best practices for optimizing video content on Youtube. Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

- Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

- Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with a remote team.

- Excellent time management skills and ability to meet deadlines.

- Excellent command of the English language. Proficiency in speaking and writing in the English language.

-Ability to thoroughly revise what you have rendered before submitting completed video files.

-Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics.

- Expect to do and submit at least 1-2 completed video files daily.

- Expect to do necessary revisions for the video as requested.

- Note: Being a Christian will make this job easier.

Order quantities: 30-60 video files each month. Budget: $1 per minute of edited video (rounded off to the nearest minute)

To Apply:
If you are excited about this opportunity, please submit the following:

- A cover letter expressing your interest and highlighting relevant experience.

- Samples/portfolio of previous AI video editing work (Veed and Descript or similar).

- Include any additional information you believe showcases your suitability for the role.

Please bid your price per minute. (Max budget for this job is $1 per minute)

Additional details for further efficiency will be provided if you are selected for this job.

Start your bid/proposal with the words “Creative Editor", so we know you have read the post and understand what is required.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

If we find that you align with our needs, we will reach out to you to discuss the next steps in the application process.


Posted On: June 17, 2024 20:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Footage-Based Video, AI-Generated Video, 360-Degree Video Editing, Audio Editing, CapCut, Descript, Video Editing, English, Graphic Design
Skills: Footage-Based Video, AI-Generated Video, 360-Degree Video Editing, Audio Editing, CapCut, Descript, Video Editing, English, Graphic Design
Country: Jamaica
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Uploader and Scheduler for Network of YouTube Channes - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone who has a lot of experience with YouTube and Trello to upload our completed videos across our network of Channels. Roughly 200 uploads are needed per month, or about 6 per day.

Your job will be to download the completed videos from Trello and upload them to YouTube, add the provided title and description, schedule the videos each day, and then communicate with the editors if there are copyright issues.

Requirements:
- Experience with YouTube, Trello, and Discord
- Fast internet
- Daily availability
- Fast communication

The pay will be $1 per uploaded video.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 17, 2024 20:28 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:YouTube Marketing, YouTube, YouTube Development, Data Entry, Social Media Marketing, Virtual Assistance, Administrative Support, Social Media Management

item.title: Communications Support (Video & Photography) - Upwork
item.description:
The Mic Across WI project uses photo and video portraits to explore the ways in which survivors of gendered violence are impacted by policing, mass incarceration, and deportation. At Freedom Action Now our vision is to advance a feminist abolitionist agenda, through which survivors of gendered violence are the antagonists in the ongoing struggle for liberation, with the power to govern, create policies, and shift the material conditions that impact their daily lives.

Skills needed:
- - Video production
- - Video editing
- - Interviewing
- - Photography

The Deliverables:
- - developing video content and photographs for various platforms (Ex: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and YouTube)

This project will have a fixed budget and will be paid according to milestones met successfully. Example milestones are:
- - Concept Development for video media & print media (We will provide the concept for the content & logos.)  
- - 1st round of refinement
- - 2nd round of refinement


Posted On: June 17, 2024 20:19 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:People, Video Editing, Video Production, Photo Editing, Photography
Skills: People, Video Editing, Video Production, Photo Editing, Photography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Experienced YT Shorts Video Editor for vintage American History channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there!

We are a YouTube Automation company and we are looking for a talented, hard-working, and experienced video editor to join our team.

We are looking for MULTIPLE people experienced in video editing for Vintage American history, similar channel to this channel:

Vintage Lifestyle USA - https://www.youtube.com/@VintageLifestyleUSA

We are looking for a long-term collaboration, on a project basis in the beginning, and eventually, if we are a good fit we would also have the full- time/retainer opportunity.

Please only apply if you already work on other YouTube Channels.

Looking forward to working with you!



Hourly Range: $30.00-$60.00
